description.raw:
This pull request implements the functionality to allow breadcrumb robots operate as relays. See this document for additional notes:

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1l0pNxFUHBcm16TQu4KAbo\_QKo6JjN-ipT2nFtkEtEhA/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1l0pNxFUHBcm16TQu4KAbo_QKo6JjN-ipT2nFtkEtEhA/edit?usp=sharing)

This pull request will need a second part. In the second part, we’ll be notified when a breadcrumb robot has been spawned, and we’ll call the function introduced in this patch to update the communication model.

I did some testing on Gazebo 9 to verify the functionality:

**Communication range from X1 \(staging area\) without any breadcrumbs.**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2996229744-relay_0.png)
‌

**Communication range from X1 \(staging area\) with one breadcrumb at vertex** `6` **\(green intersection after the yellow segment\).**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/917970074-relay_1.png)
‌

**Communication range from X1 \(staging area\) with breadcrumbs at vertices** `6` **and** `26`

**\(downslope segment after the light blue turn\).**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2305742824-relay_2.png)
‌

**Communication range from X1 \(staging area\) with breadcrumbs at vertices** `6`**,** `26` **and** `29` **\(intersection in blue color in the upper middle section from this perspective\).**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2855853023-relay_3.png)
‌
description.html:
This pull request implements the functionality to allow breadcrumb robots operate as relays. See this document for additional notes:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1l0pNxFUHBcm16TQu4KAbo_QKo6JjN-ipT2nFtkEtEhA/edit?usp=sharing

This pull request will need a second part. In the second part, we’ll be notified when a breadcrumb robot has been spawned, and we’ll call the function introduced in this patch to update the communication model.

I did some testing on Gazebo 9 to verify the functionality:

Communication range from X1 (staging area) without any breadcrumbs.

‌

Communication range from X1 (staging area) with one breadcrumb at vertex 6 (green intersection after the yellow segment).

‌

Communication range from X1 (staging area) with breadcrumbs at vertices 6 and 26

(downslope segment after the light blue turn).

‌

Communication range from X1 (staging area) with breadcrumbs at vertices 6, 26 and 29 (intersection in blue color in the upper middle section from this perspective).

‌

title: Communication support for breadcrumbs
